pages.title: All Armors
pages.text: As you can see there are a TON of armors in the game so it is almost impossible to see how good each are.$(br2)I may have forgotten pieces that are only hats or chestplates so there are more pieces in game.

pages.title: Armor Link
pages.text: This link takes you to a spreadsheet that contains every armor in the game containing:$(li)Armor Points$(li)Armor Toughness$(li)Each piece info$(li)Special armor buffs$()$(br)You can access this anytime as a reference for each armor.
